text: William Skocpol (born 1946) is an American physicist, Professor of Physics Emeritus at Boston University and an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society. His wife is Theda Skocpol. The last name Skočpol is, according to him, Czech. ==References== ==External links== *William SKOCPOL, Professor Emeritus at Boston University Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Boston University faculty Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Harvard University alumni Category:Michigan State University alumni Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society
title: William Skocpol
